editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Deluxe Psalter, ዳዊት፡. Psalm 1 (f. i r, top); Record of vow of person from whom a demon has been exorcised (f. i r, bottom); List of the feast days of the Saints and Apostles (ff. i v); Asmat Prayer against wild animals (ff. i v - ii r) (f. ii v, in blue ink); Psalter, ዳዊት፡ (f-122r); Image of the Praises of Mary, መልክአ፡ ውዳሴ፡, incipit: ፈቀደ: እግዚእ: ለአዳም: ያግዕዞ: (Chaîne, Répertoire 398, MG59 701ff) (f-128r); Image of the Gate of Light, መልክዐ፡ አንቀጸ፡ ብርሃን፡, incipit, ቅድስት: ወብፅዕት: በልሳነ: ኵሉ: ዘነፍስ: (Chaîne, Répertoire 241, MG59 728ff.) (f-129v); Hymn to Mary, “For the Love of the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit, Our Father,” incipit, በእንተ: ፍቅረ: አብ: ወወልድ: ወመንፈስ: ቅዱስ: አቡነ: (no Chaîne, Répertoire number) (f-131r); List of the Feast Days (); Asmat prayer for drowning demons, ጸሎት: በእንተ: መስጥመ: አጋንንት:, incipit, በስመ: አብ: በል::ጸሎት: በእንተ: መስጥም: ባሪያ: ወሌጌዎን: መስጥም: ይዘኩም:...(f-132v); List of the Feast Days (); Prayer on the Hebrew Alphabet, incipit, በስመ: አብ: ወወልድ... አሌፍ: ርድአኒ: በየማንከ: ልዕልት: ወበመዝራእትከ: ጽንእት:.. (f-134r); Asmat Prayer, “I Beseech You Lest I die Early,” ተማኅጸንኩ: ከመ: ኢይሙት: ዘእንበለ: ጊዜየ, incipit, በስመ: አብ: ወወልድ:...ተማኅፀንኩ: አንሰ: ከመ: ኢይሙት: ዘእንበለ: ጊዜየ:... (f); Deluxe Psalter from Government scriptorium (?).

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
